title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Autonomous Vehicle Network Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Students perform simulations and data analysis using digital devices, applying findings to real autonomous driving scenarios through team-based projects.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application of mmWave communication and OFDM technology in autonomous driving.
Learners can design vehicle-to-vehicle communication optimization strategies using reinforcement learning algorithms.
Learners can implement simulations that improve data transmission efficiency by over 20% through analysis of QSI (Queue State Information) and CSI (Channel State Information).
Learners establish an evaluation system to measure the environmental perception accuracy (speed resolution) of autonomous vehicles through project-based assessment.

resources: Python-Based Reinforcement Learning Platform (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
